article_text:
A tax on travelers who rent cars at Newark Liberty International Airport is helping to fund an animal shelter, a park and a jobs program in New Jersey's largest city.

Depending on the viewpoint, that is either a well-earned boon for Newark or a misguided levy on out-of-towners.

The 5% tax on car rentals is helping to pay for projects...
